mapper.insert: INSERT INTO appointment (appointment_size_name, end_date_time, location_name, start_date_time, tutee_email , tutor_email, tutee_request_comment) VALUES (#{appointmentSizeName}, STR_TO_DATE(#{endDateTimeString}, #{formatPattern}), #{locationName}, STR_TO_DATE(#{startDateTimeString}, #{formatPattern}), #{tuteeEmail}, #{tutorEmail}, #{tuteeRequestComment})
mapper.update:
UPDATE appointment
cancellation_reason = #{appointmentModelNew.cancellationReason},
is_cancelled = #{appointmentModelNew.isCancelled},
is_confirmed = #{appointmentModelNew.isConfirmed},
tutee_request_comment = #{appointmentModelNew.tuteeRequestComment},
AND end_date_time = STR_TO_DATE(#{appointmentModelOld.endDateTimeString}, #{formatPattern})
AND tutee_email = #{appointmentModelOld.tuteeEmail}
AND tutor_email = #{appointmentModelOld.tutorEmail}
AND start_date_time = STR_TO_DATE(#{appointmentModelOld.startDateTimeString}, #{formatPattern})
mapper.select:
SELECT a.appointment_id, a.appointment_size_name, a.cancellation_reason, a.end_date_time AS end_date_time_value, a.is_cancelled, a.is_confirmed, a.location_name, a.start_date_time AS start_date_time_value, a.tutee_email AS tutee_email, tutee.first_name AS tutee_first_name, tutee.last_name AS tutee_last_name, tutee.phone_number AS tutee_phone_number, tutee.picture_url AS tutee_picture_url, a.tutee_request_comment, tutor.first_name AS tutor_first_name, tutor.last_name AS tutor_last_name, tutor.phone_number AS tutor_phone_number, a.tutor_email AS tutor_email, tutor.picture_url AS tutor_picture_url FROM appointment AS a INNER JOIN tutor ON a.tutor_email = tutor.email INNER JOIN tutee ON a.tutee_email = tutee.email
AND a.is_confirmed = true AND a.is_cancelled = false
AND STR_TO_DATE(#{endDateTimeString}, #{formatPattern}) > a.start_date_time
AND LOWER(tutor.email) = LOWER(#{tutorEmail})
AND STR_TO_DATE(#{startDateTimeString}, #{formatPattern}) < a.end_date_time
